alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 12:26PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dawson Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lindsay to 7 miles southwest of Bloomfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glendive, Intake, West Glendive, Lindsay, Stipek and Forest Park. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 326 and 329, and between mile markers 299 and 325. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
